item.title: glimpses Insights
item.description: Thought of sharing the video that shows my humble effort to create simple interactive visualizaton of the global distribution of glimpses users with maximum sessions. Thanks to Tableau Public and github-pages, I found these two immensly helpful in creating, embedding and publishing viz. Tableau Public is a free software that can connect to a file (Excel, CSV, JSON..) or to a server and create stunning interactive data visualizations for the web.
